Body:
"""Ensure author validation can distinguish authors with same surname.
        """
authors = [{'name': 'Zhuyin Ren'}, {'name': 'Yufeng Liu'}, {'name':
    'Tianfeng Lu'}, {'name': 'Oluwayemisi O Oluwole'}, {'name':
    'Graham M Goldin'}]
v.validate({'reference': {'authors': authors, 'doi':
    '10.1016/j.combustflame.2013.08.018'}}, update=True)
assert 'Missing author: Liuyan Lu' in v.errors['reference']
authors = [{'name': 'Zhuyin Ren'}, {'name': 'Yufeng Liu'}, {'name':
    'Liuyan Lu'}, {'name': 'Oluwayemisi O Oluwole'}, {'name':
    'Graham M Goldin'}]
v.validate({'reference': {'authors': authors, 'doi':
    '10.1016/j.combustflame.2013.08.018'}}, update=True)
assert 'Missing author: Tianfeng Lu' in v.errors['reference']
internet_missing
